sentences: John Byrne Cooke (October 5, 1940 â€“ September 3, 2017) was an American author, musician, and photographer.
In the 1960s he played with the bluegrass band, the Charles River Valley Boys, and was Janis Joplin's road manager from 1967 until her death in 1970.
Cooke lived in Jackson Hole, Wyoming from 1982 until his death from cancer in 2017, aged 76.
